title: Arma 3: Ultimate Edition – v2.06.148470 + HotFix Build 7756264 + All DLCs + Multiplayer
body:
Arma 3: Ultimate Edition – v2.06.148470 + HotFix Build 7756264 + All DLCs + Multiplayer


Genres/Tags: Action, Tactical shooter, First-person, Third-person, 3D
Company: Bohemia Interactive
Languages: RUS/ENG/MULTi14
Original Size: 105.2 GB
Repack Size: 53.5/53.9 GB [Selective Download]

 

Download Mirrors

  • 1337x | [magnet] [.torrent file only]
  • RuTor [magnet]
  • Tapochek.net
  • Filehoster: MultiUpload (10+ hosters, interchangeable) [Use JDownloader2]
  • Filehoster: ZippyShare
  • Filehoster: BayFiles
  • Filehoster: LetsUpload [Use JDownloader2]
  • Filehoster: OneDrive (Uploaded by DyR0 t(-_-t), NOT compatible with other mirrors)

Fixed fg-09.bin

Copy this fixed fg-09.bin to the repack folder before starting installation to avoid problems with missing .pbo/.ebo files afterwards.

https://pastefg.hermietkreeft.site/?35d5a6254c82d40c#9ozXQ6WSQGcqUsDAvMbf99ZWkJNtXuuAZDCrsidcBWAz

Discussion and (possible) future updates on CS.RIN.RU thread

Screenshots (Click to enlarge)


Repack Features

  • Based on Arma.3.Western.Sahara-CODEX ISO release: codex-arma.3.western.sahara.iso (110,968,963,072 bytes)
  • HotFix Build 7756264 updated files (1.9 GB) are available in _Update folder after installation, thanks to Skiminok. Mind you that applying those will make this repack incompatible with possible future delta-patches
  • ARMA3.v2.06.148470.CreamAPI.MPFiX and ARMA3.v2.06.148478v4.CreamAPI.Performance.Binaries are avilable in NoDVD folder after installation, thanks to Arma3ExileServer. Use them to play via Steam on unofficial cracked servers
  • Game version is v2.06.148470, all released DLCs included and activated
  • Newer DLCs should be enabled in launcher options; disable BattleEye as well just in case
  • 100% Lossless & MD5 Perfect: all files are identical to originals after installation (only bonus PDF manuals/maps has been decrypted)
  • NOTHING ripped, NOTHING re-encoded
  • Selective download feature: you can skip downloading and installing of bonus content (OST, Maps & Tactical Guide)
  • Smaller archive size (compressed from cumulative 105.2 to 53.5~53.9 GB, depending on selected components)
  • Installation takes 1.5-3 hours, depending on your configuration (mostly on HDD speed)
  • After-install integrity check so you could make sure that everything installed properly
  • HDD space after installation: up to 110.3 GB (117 GB during installation)
  • Game language can be changed in game settings
  • At least 4 GB of free RAM (inc. virtual) required for installing this repack

Game Description

Enlist for active duty with Arma 3 Apex and be deployed to a brand new warzone. With its distinct geographical features, the South Pacific island archipelago of Tanoa introduces fresh opportunities for all types of combat operations. Engage in Arma 3’s tactical gameplay, where movement, shooting, and teamwork truly matter, and make use of new vehicles, weapons and gear to overcome the challenges of a hostile foreign terrain. The Apex expansion represents the pinnacle of over 15 years of Arma development. Enjoy one of the most meaningful gaming experiences on PC; feel the adrenaline-rush of a hard-earned victory, discover a continuously evolving platform packed with official and player-created content, and join one of thousands Arma community groups to meet new people from across the world. Authentic, open, and diverse – this is the PC’s premier military game at its finest. Welcome to Arma 3 Apex!

Included content

  • Arma 3 v2.04.147540
  • Art of War
  • Arma 3 Zeus
  • Arma 3 Karts
  • Arma 3 Helicopters
  • Arma 3 Marksmen
  • Arma 3 Apex
  • Arma 3 Laws of War
  • Arma 3 Jets
  • Arma 3 Malden
  • Arma 3 Tac-Ops Mission Pack
  • Arma 3 Tanks
  • Arma 3 Creator DLC: Global Mobilization – Cold War Germany
  • Arma 3 Creator DLC: S.O.G. Prairie Fire
  • Arma 3 Creator DLC: CSLA Iron Curtain
  • Arma 3 Creator DLC: Western Sahara
  • Arma 3 Contact
  • Arma 3 Old Man Campaign
  • Soundtrack
  • Maps
  • Tactical Guide

Backwards Compatibility

This repack IS NOT backwards compatible with my previous Arma 3 repacks.
